subject: Golf
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Long Island University Brooklyn women’s golf team, which will compete at the N.C.A.A. regional tournament this week, has a roster of players from New Zealand, Spain, Italy, England, Mexico and the United States (Connecticut).
snippet: Long Island University Brooklyn women’s golf team, which will compete at the N.C.A.A. regional tournament this week, has a roster of players from New Zealand, Spain, Italy, England, Mexico and the United States (Connecticut).
